Package popt4jlib.DE

Differential Evolution Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VectorIntfRndMakerIntf
    interface for initializing DE (sub-)populations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DblArray1VectorRndMaker
    the class generates random vectors in R^n as VectorIntf objects that may obey certain bounding-box constraints.
    DDE
    A parallel/distributed implementation of the Differential Evolution algorithm.
    DDE2
    A parallel/distributed implementation of the Differential Evolution algorithm.
    DDE2Thread
    auxiliary class not part of the public API.
    DDEThread
    auxiliary class not part of the public API.
    FastDblArray1VectorLHSRndMaker
    the class generates random vectors in R^n as VectorIntf objects that obey certain bounding-box constraints, utilizing the Latin Hypercube Sampling technique (LHS).
    FastDblArray1VectorURndMaker
    the class generates uniform random vectors in R^n as VectorIntf objects that obey certain bounding-box constraints.

Package popt4jlib.DE Description

Differential Evolution Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

A parallel/distributed implementation of the standard DE algorithm, optimizing scalar functions with domain the vector space Rn
